page.title: 06The Parish Church Harlescott
page.content: In 1960 the Church of The Holy Spirit was started the foundation stone being laid on 22nd., April 1960 at Meadow Farm Drive. The church was consecrated by the Right Reverend Stretton Reeve the Lord Bishop of Lichfield on 21st., June l961. In l983 the Parish of Harlescott had 16,970 inhabitants, a parish church and a small community centre. The Parish Church is situated in Meadow Farm Drive with the Vicarage and Church Hall next door, the hall is used for many things in the community including the playschool. The Community Centre is situated in York Road at the junction of Little Harlescott Lane. It is used for Sunday services, as a playschool and as a meeting place for the community. Mrs.C.Carter, School Dinner Lady.
